scripts.e2e-test: export FUNCTIONS_CMD='gcloud beta functions' && sh test/updateFunctions.sh && BASE_URL="https://$GCF_REGION-$GCLOUD_PROJECT.cloudfunctions.net/" ava -T 20s --verbose test/*.test.js
scripts.system-test: export FUNCTIONS_CMD='functions' && sh test/updateFunctions.sh && BASE_URL="http://localhost:8010/$GCLOUD_PROJECT/$GCF_REGION" ava -T 20s --verbose test/*.test.js
